rules_text:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may have this enchantment become a 4/4 blue Whale creature with flying in addition to its other types until end of turn.
Whenever an enchantment creature you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
notes:
8 x mono color rares
3 x mono color mythics
10 x two-color rares/mythics
3 x colorless rares/mythics
